content:
Citrus～柑橘味香气～
一位是从来没有谈过恋爱的辣妹蓝原柚子，另一位是美丽而冷酷的学生会会长蓝原芽衣。会有什么恋爱展开呢……
Citrus～
When Yuzu Aihara, a fashionable, spontaneous and fun-loving city-girl, meet Mei Aihara, the hard-working, beautiful and cold student council president.

Photography: 8bit Wonderland
Yuzu: 萌萌
Mei: Me

=======================
感谢萌萌陪我拍橘里橘气！！！
#cirtusmanga
